desktop.shareYourTrip: Share your trip. Find your group. Organize everything in one place: groups, itineraries and private chat.
desktop.premiumFeatures: The first 50 will get Premium features for life. Join the beta and get early access: create groups, publish itineraries, coordinate expenses and tasks, and find compatible people.

mobile.shareYourTrip: Share your trip. Find your group.
mobile.premiumFeatures: The first 50 will get Premium features for life. Join the beta and get early access: create groups, publish itineraries, coordinate expenses and tasks, and find compatible people.

hero.title: Find compatible people to travel with and make the plan happen for real.

betaSignup.button: I want to sign up for the beta

howItWorks.title: Want to travel in a group?
howItWorks.subtitle: Safar makes it simple: find, create and plan.

createTrip.title: Create and publish your trip
createTrip.description: Create a group trip and share it with your friends.

joinGroup.title: Join a group
joinGroup.description: Explore open trips by destination and dates. Request a spot and confirm with one click.

organizeItinerary.title: Organize the day-to-day itinerary
organizeItinerary.description: Add activities and schedules; tag each day (relax, party, adventure, culture...). The whole group sees and proposes.

privateChat.title: Private trip chat
privateChat.description: Coordinate everything from a single chat: questions, documents, votes and changes in real time.
